JOB DESCRIPTION: Skillsets required:    BE in Computer Science/IT or equivalent with 0-5 years experience    Solid programmer - must understand core programming principles, appreciate the need for design & planning.    Must have a proper grasp of the fundamentals of CS algorithms.    Must show ability and interest to work on, and learn, a wide variety of open-source technology platforms and packages    Sound knowledge of C and C++ programming is desired.    Must be fluent in Python or Perl or any other scripting language    Must be at ease working with the linux shell; being a power user of linux is a plus    Must be able to work under deadline pressure and deliver.    Interested to work in a small start-up in an informal work culture
